title: Nongna Vegetarian Food
description: Menu is displayed on the wall in Thai. Includes all-vegan noodle soup, papaya salad, spring rolls, mushroom satay, in-house-made tofu and veggie meats, wonton, iced drinks. Everything is vegan with the exception of canned Carnation milk for ice drinks available on request. Owner speaks a bit of English. Located in between two other Bud. vegetarian restaurants, a couple of minutes walk west from Suan Dok and across the street from Chiang Mai University Faculty of Pharmacy (purple color) building. Previously named Na Somtam.
